EmailTemplate.name: SFDC bi-annual maintenance
EmailTemplate.subject: Planned System Maintenance: December 15th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
This is to notify you of a planned system maintenance.
Pivotal Support uses Salesforce Service Cloud. Salesforce is performing their​ site switching process​ on December 15, 2018, from 9pm PST to 11pm PST.​​
What this means for you: ● If you plan to access Pivotal Support via ​community.pivotal.io​ during the maintenance window, please ​ensure you are logged in by 8:45 pm PST,​ for read-only access ● If you need to contact Pivotal Support during the maintenance window, please do so via ​phone​ (it will not be possible to submit or update a support case while in read only mode)
You can find more detail at: https://content.pivotal.io/support Please direct any questions or feedback to support-enablement@pivotal.io
Kind regards, ~ Pivotal Support team
